data.title: 'I don't tear down my...' Zeenat Aman on Mumtaz criticising her marriage as a 'living hell'
meta_keywords: Zeenat Aman Mumtaz war of words
Zeenat Aman vs Mumtaz live-in jibe
Mumtaz calls Zeenat Aman’s marriage living hell
Zeenat Aman hits back at Mumtaz’s marriage living hell jibe
Saira Banu disagrees with Zeenat Aman’s living-in advice
Zeenat Aman Mumtaz Saira Banu fight live-in advice
data.meta_description: After Zeenat Aman advised people on living-in before marriage, Mumtaz criticised her and called her marriage a ‘living hell’. Now, the Qurbani actress has responded to Mumtaz’s jibe stating she doesn’t tear down her colleagues. Saira Banu has also reacted to the controversy.
data.text:
A few days back Zeenat Aman shared relationship advice recommending people to live together before getting married.

This didn’t go down well with her colleague and veteran actress Mumtaz who criticised Zeenat and called her marriage a “living hell”.

Now, Zeenat was asked about her response to Mumtaz’s jibe, the Qurbani actress stated that she has never tore down her colleagues and won’t be doing that now either.

The legendary actress told Hindustan Times, “Everyone is entitled to their own opinions. I’ve never been one to comment on others' personal lives or tear down my colleagues, and I’m not going to start now.”

What Zeenat Aman had advised

A few days back, Zeenat had taken to Instagram and stated, “One of you asked me about relationship advice in the comments section of my last post. Here’s a personal opinion I haven’t previously shared - if you’re in a relationship, I strongly recommend that you LIVE TOGETHER before getting married!”

Mumtaz’s jibe
